dimension: 87 x 29 in. (221.0 x 73.7 cm) with fringe
title: Shawl (perraje)
text: This is a superb example of a complex warp jaspe. Simple jaspe patterns consist of one or two separate figures (<I>labores<I>) in each warp stripe, but this one combines seven different designs and reverses them midway to create a mirror image. The thread for the colored figures is dyed first in the base color, then over-dyed in indigo once the <I>labores<I> have been tied.
description: cotton and silk, multicolor (pink, red, green, yellow, purple, white) stripes
